description:
Ever since the freshmen joined, the frenemies` atmosphere has raised between seniors and freshmen. Ogasawara can`t control his anger anymore. 
He kicks the bucket full of coins and the coins are all over the ground. The tention explores and the freshmen and seniors get into fights. 
Kurokan seems to know it`s coming and looks like he doesn`t care. At the same time, Morioka is watching Sakamotoâ€™s pitches repeatedly and trying to find his flaws.
Source: crunchyroll
